legal_basis: subsection 83 of the Canada Pension Plan
decision_reasoning: detailed grounds for appeal, questioning the interpretation of medical evidence and the date of disability
result_of_case: Minister's leave to appeal was upheld; Mr. McDonald's judicial review application was dismissed
procedure_followed: Judicial review in Federal Court analyzing whether the Minister's leave application met the threshold for arguable issues
cause_of_action: Mr. McDonald sought to quash the Minister's leave to appeal the grant of his disability benefits
